structure.unit: COUNTY AND CITY BRIDGES, TUNNELS, AND FERRIES

law.text: In addition to the powers and duties and subject to the limitations enumerated in KRS 181.560 to 181.840, the commission may do all things necessary or convenient in the construction or acquisition, maintenance and operation of any bridge to be constructed or acquired under the provisions of KRS 181.560 to 181.840, and in the financing thereof, in order that the bridge may be operated free of tolls as early as possible and practicable.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3235g-26.
